CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Note that , in stark contrast to PCDTBT : PC71BM system in which thermal annealing reduced the photovoltaic parameters ( FF , J SC , and V OC ) , 22 the performance of all PCDSeBT - based devices for this study is considerably improved as a result of thermal treatment.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT: This is a material name.
2. PC71BM: This is a material name.
3. PCDSeBT: This is a material name.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Note that , in stark contrast to PCDTBT : PC71BM system in which thermal annealing reduced the photovoltaic parameters ( FF , J SC , and V OC ) , 22 the performance of all PCDSeBT - based devices for this study is considerably improved as a result of thermal treatment.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT: This is a type of material, specifically a polymer, used in organic photovoltaic devices. It is not a property name.
2. PC71BM: This is also a type of material, specifically a fullerene derivative, used in organic photovoltaic devices. It is not a property name.
3. thermal annealing: This is a process or treatment, typically involving heating, used to improve the performance of certain materials, including organic photovoltaic devices.
4. FF: This stands for Fill Factor, which is a property of a solar cell that measures its maximum reversible power delivery under a given voltage.
5. J SC: This stands for Short Circuit Current Density, which is a property of a solar cell that measures the maximum current it can deliver under short circuit conditions.
6. V OC: This stands for Open Circuit Voltage, which is a property of a solar cell that measures the voltage it generates when no current is flowing.

So, the property names in the paragraph are FF, J SC, and V OC.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

The following entities in the paragraph refer to material properties:

1. PC71BM: This is a material used in organic photovoltaic devices.
2. PCDSeBT: This is a type of material used in organic photovoltaic devices.
3. thermal treatment: This is a process that affects the properties of certain materials, including organic photovoltaic devices.
4. FF (Fill Factor): This is a property of a solar cell.
5. J SC (Short Circuit Current Density): This is a property of a solar cell.
6. V OC (Open Circuit Voltage): This is a property of a solar cell.

Therefore, the relevant entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties are PC71BM, PCDSeBT, thermal treatment, FF, J SC, and V OC.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| FF (Fill Factor) |
| J SC (Short Circuit Current Density) |
| V OC (Open Circuit Voltage) |
| thermal treatment |
| PC71BM |
| PCDSeBT |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Note that , in stark contrast to PCDTBT : PC71BM system in which thermal annealing reduced the photovoltaic parameters ( FF , J SC , and V OC ) , 22 the performance of all PCDSeBT - based devices for this study is considerably improved as a result of thermal treatment.

Let's think step by step.

1. PC71BM system: This is not a property value entity, but rather a specific system mentioned in the paragraph.
2. PCDTBT: This is not a property value entity, but rather an abbreviation for a specific type of material.
3. FF: This stands for Fill Factor, which is a photovoltaic parameter. It is a property value entity.
4. J SC: This stands for Short Circuit Current Density, which is a photovoltaic parameter. It is a property value entity.
5. V OC: This stands for Open Circuit Voltage, which is a photovoltaic parameter. It is a property value entity.

So, the property value entities in the paragraph are FF, J SC, and V OC.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

The property value entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to the values of material properties are:

1. J SC (Short Circuit Current Density)
2. V OC (Open Circuit Voltage)
3. FF (Fill Factor)

These entities represent the specific values of the photovoltaic parameters (J SC, V OC, and FF) for the PCDSeBT-based devices before and after thermal treatment.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| J SC (Short Circuit Current Density) |
| V OC (Open Circuit Voltage) |
| FF (Fill Factor) |
